trans-unit.source: Defines the interface that receives workflow instance creation, execution, and termination status information from a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.DebugEngine.DebugController"></xref> object running inside the workflow host application.
trans-unit.target: Meghatározza a felületet, amely megkapja a munkafolyamat példány létrehozását, végrehajtási és lezárást állapotára vonatkozó információt a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.DebugEngine.DebugController"> </xref> a munkafolyamat gazdaalkalmazást belül futó objektum.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] This interface is implemented by a .NET remoting object hosted by the debugger.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Ez az interfész a .NET távoli eljáráshívási objektum a hibakereső által üzemeltetett valósítják meg.

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.ExecutionStatus*> of an activity within the workflow changes.
An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> instance.
An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a workflow type.
A <xref:System.Guid> associated with the currently running workflow instance.
A <xref:System.String> containing the fully qualified name of the current activity.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>az aktuális tevékenység teljesen minősített nevét tartalmazó.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the qualified name of the parent activity.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.ExecutionStatus*> of the current activity.
An <xref:System.Int32> containing the activity execution context ID associated with the current activity.
trans-unit.target: Egy <xref:System.Int32>az aktuális tevékenység végrehajtási környezet Tevékenységazonosító tartalmazó társított.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Called when an assembly is loaded in the app domain corresponding to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> in the workflow host application.
trans-unit.target: Meghívva, amikor egy szerelvény be töltve az alkalmazástartományban megfelelő a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"> </xref> a munkafolyamat gazdaalkalmazásban.

trans-unit.source: An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> instance.
A <xref:System.String> containing the path on disk from where the assembly is loaded
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>Az elérési útvonalat, ahol a szerelvény be töltve a lemezen tartalmazó</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether the assembly is loaded from the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Boolean>, amely azt jelzi, hogy a szerelvény be töltve a globális szerelvény-gyorsítótárból.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Called before the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.ExecutionStatus*> of an activity within the workflow changes.
An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> instance.
An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a workflow type.
A <xref:System.Guid> associated with the currently running workflow instance.
A <xref:System.String> containing the fully qualified name of the current activity.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>az aktuális tevékenység teljesen minősített nevét tartalmazó.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the qualified name of the parent activity.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.ExecutionStatus*> of the current activity.
An <xref:System.Int32> containing the activity execution context ID associated with the current activity.
trans-unit.target: Egy <xref:System.Int32>az aktuális tevékenység végrehajtási környezet Tevékenységazonosító tartalmazó társított.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Called before a handler in the code-beside is about to be invoked.
trans-unit.target: A kód mellett a kezelő arra készül, hogy hívható hívni.

trans-unit.source: An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> instance.
An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a workflow type.
A <xref:System.String> containing the fully qualified name of the current activity.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>az aktuális tevékenység teljesen minősített nevét tartalmazó.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.DebugEngine.ActivityHandlerDescriptor"></xref> that contains the information regarding the code-beside handler method that is about to be invoked.
trans-unit.target: Egy <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.DebugEngine.ActivityHandlerDescriptor"> </xref> , amely tartalmazza a kód mellett eseménykezelő metódus, amely hamarosan hívható vonatkozó információkat.

trans-unit.source: Called after a handler in the code-beside is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Miután meghívták a kezelő a kód mellett a neve.

trans-unit.source: An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> instance.
A <xref:System.Guid> associated with the currently running workflow instance.
An <xref:System.Int32> containing the ID of the thread on which the handler was invoked.
trans-unit.target: Egy <xref:System.Int32>a szál, amelyen a kezelő lett meghívva Azonosítóját tartalmazó.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the fully qualified name of the current activity.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>az aktuális tevékenység teljesen minősített nevét tartalmazó.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Called when a workflow instance completes.
An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> instance.
A <xref:System.Guid> associated with the currently running workflow instance.
Called when a workflow instance is created.
An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> instance.
A <xref:System.Guid> associated with the currently running workflow instance.
An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a workflow type.
Called when the workflow instance is dynamically updated with a workflow change.
trans-unit.target: Hívható meg, ha a munkafolyamat-példány dinamikusan frissülő egy munkafolyamat módosítását.

trans-unit.source: An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> instance.
A <xref:System.Guid> associated with the currently running workflow instance.
An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a workflow type.
Called when a new workflow type is loaded by the workflow runtime engine in the workflow host application.
trans-unit.target: Hívható meg, ha egy új munkafolyamat-típushoz be van töltve, a munkafolyamat futásidejű motor a munkafolyamat gazdaalkalmazásban.

trans-unit.source: An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> instance.
An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a workflow type.
A <xref:System.String> containing the assembly name from which the workflow type was loaded.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>tartalmazó a szerelvény neve, amelyen a munkafolyamat-típushoz lett betöltve.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the full path of the markup file corresponding to the workflow, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the workflow type was a code-only workflow.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>tartalmazó elérési útját a munkafolyamat megfelelő jelölőfájl vagy <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Ha a munkafolyamat-típushoz lett-e a kód csak munkafolyamat.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the md5 hash code for the workflow markup definition, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the workflow type was a code-only workflow.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>a munkafolyamat-jelölés definíciójának az md5 kivonatoló kódot tartalmazó vagy <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Ha a munkafolyamat-típushoz lett-e a kód csak munkafolyamat.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether the workflow definition was modified dynamically.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Boolean>, amely azt jelzi, hogy a munkafolyamat-definíció dinamikusan módosult.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the fully qualified name of the workflow type.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>tartalmazó a teljesen minősített neve a munkafolyamat-típushoz.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the workflow type name.
A <xref:System.String> containing the XAML serialized format of the workflow type.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>az XAML-t tartalmazó szerializált formátum a munkafolyamat-típus.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Called to set the initial status of the activities in a workflow.
trans-unit.target: A kezdeti állapotot a tevékenységek a munkafolyamaton belül beállítva hívni.

trans-unit.source: This method is called when a workflow instance is loaded from a persistence store or when the debugger is attached to a workflow host that has workflow instance already running.
trans-unit.target: Ezt a módszert nevezik, amikor egy munkafolyamat-példányhoz be van töltve a megőrző tárolóból, vagy a van csatolva hibakereső, amelyen a munkafolyamat-példány már fut a munkafolyamat-gazda.

trans-unit.source: An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> instance.
An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a workflow type.
A <xref:System.Guid> associated with the currently running workflow instance.
A <xref:System.String> containing the fully qualified name of the current activity.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>az aktuális tevékenység teljesen minősített nevét tartalmazó.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the qualified name of the parent activity.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.ExecutionStatus*> of the current activity.
An <xref:System.Int32> containing the activity execution context ID associated with the current activity.
trans-unit.target: Egy <xref:System.Int32>az aktuális tevékenység végrehajtási környezet Tevékenységazonosító tartalmazó társított.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Called when an activity enters the Executing state.
trans-unit.target: Hívható meg, ha egy tevékenység Executing állapotba lép.

trans-unit.source: An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> instance.
An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a workflow type.
A <xref:System.String> containing the fully qualified name of the current activity.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>az aktuális tevékenység teljesen minősített nevét tartalmazó.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> of handlers associated with an activity.
